Short notes from teaching

  • Mirna’s class – notes
  • The Rank-Nullity Theorem, a note written for a student at UCLan in 2017
  • Arithmetization of syntax, a note from a course on Gödel’s Incompleteness Theorems that I gave in the Nesin Mathematics Village in 2013
  • The Cayley–Hamilton Theorem, some thoughts about the proof, a note that came from a discussion in tutorials at Merton
  • Riemann Surfaces (extended text, problem sheet), a 10-minute lecture
  • course outline, a draft course outline for a graph theory course from 2015
